Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepository
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets instead
    org.kitesdk.data.RandomAccessDatasetRepository
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepositories
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets instead
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.kitesdk.morphline.base.Notifications.LIFE_CYLCLE
    (since 0.10.1) Use Notifications.LIFE_CYCLE instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepositories.open(String)
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets.load(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepositories.open(URI)
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets.load(java.net.URI, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepositories.openRandomAccess(String)
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets.load(java.lang.String, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.kitesdk.data.DatasetRepositories.openRandomAccess(URI)
    will be removed in 0.17.0. Move to using Datasets.load(java.net.URI, java.lang.Class) instead
    org.kitesdk.data.Datasets.repositoryFor(String)
    will be removed in 0.17.0.
    org.kitesdk.data.Datasets.repositoryFor(URI)
    will be removed in 0.17.0.
    org.kitesdk.data.flume.Log4jAppender.setDatasetRepositoryClass(String)
    Use datasetRepositoryUri with a 'repo:' URI.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.kitesdk.morphline.base.AbstractCommand(Config, Command, Command, MorphlineContext)
    org.kitesdk.morphline.stdlib.AbstractFieldTransformCommand(Config, Command, Command, MorphlineContext)
    org.kitesdk.morphline.stdio.AbstractParser(Config, Command, Command, MorphlineContext)
    org.kitesdk.tools.CopyTask(View, View, Class)
    will be removed in 0.17.0; use CopyTask(View, View)
